Trenton.name: Trenton
Trenton.description:
<c=088482>Trenton</c>
A time wizard from another dimension. His cards shift <c=boldPink>energy</c> across turns, adds cards to the top of the <c=boldPink>Draw Pile</c>, and responds to events of <c=boldPink>the previous turn</c>.

TemporalEngine.name: Temporal Engine
TemporalEngine.description: Cycle between gaining 1 energy for two turns and losing 1 energy for a third turn.

description.None: Add <c=white>Delayed Shot</c> to the top of your <c=white>draw pile</c>.
description.A: Add <c=white>Delayed Shot A</c> to the top of your <c=white>draw pile</c>.
description.B: Add <c=white>Delayed Shot B</c> to the top of your <c=white>draw pile</c>.

description.None: Add <c=status>evade</c> = total dmg/2 of enemy's cannon attacks
description.A: Add <c=status>evade</c> = total dmg/2 of enemy's cannon attacks
description.B: Add <c=status>evade</c> = total dmg of enemy's cannon attacks

description.None: Attack, using all energy. Dmg = x2 per <c=energy>energy</c>
Use all energy, attack for dmg = x2 per energy
description.A: Attack, using all energy. Dmg = x2.5 per <c=energy>energy</c>
description.B: Attack, using all energy. Dmg = x2 per <c=energy>energy</c>

Abeyance.name: Abeyance

description.None: Pick a <c=cardtrait>discarded</c> card. Send it to the top of your <c=white>draw pile</c>.
description.A: Pick two <c=cardtrait>discarded</c> cards. Send them to the top of your <c=white>draw pile</c>.
description.B: Pick an <c=cardtrait>exhausted</c> card. Send it to the top of your <c=white>draw pile</c>.

Abeyance.GetCardSelectText: Pick a discarded card to send to the top of your draw pile.
